Read NetCDF general information from 'ncdf4' objects

Source: R/argo-info.R
argo_nc_read_info.Rd

Read NetCDF general information from 'ncdf4' objects

argo_nc_read_info(nc, vars = NULL)

Arguments

nc

A handle created using ncdf4::nc_open().
vars

A vector of variable names to include. The ordering of the variables is not guaranteed, and variables that do not exist are ignored. For nc_read_*() and read_*() variants, these are the raw variable names (all caps, without "date" substituted for "juld").

Value

A tibble::tibble()

Examples

prof_file <- system.file(
  "cache-test/dac/csio/2900313/profiles/D2900313_000.nc",
  package = "argodata"
)

nc_prof <- ncdf4::nc_open(prof_file)
argo_nc_read_info(nc_prof)

#> # A tibble: 1 x 15
#>   DATA_TYPE FORMAT_VERSION HANDBOOK_VERSION REFERENCE_DATE_… DATE_CREATION
#>   <chr>     <chr>          <chr>            <chr>            <chr>        
#> 1 "Argo pr… "3.1 "         "1.2 "           19500101000000   200509261036…
#> # … with 10 more variables: DATE_UPDATE <chr>, att_title <chr>,
#> #   att_institution <chr>, att_source <chr>, att_history <chr>,
#> #   att_references <chr>, att_comment <chr>, att_user_manual_version <chr>,
#> #   att_Conventions <chr>, att_featureType <chr>
ncdf4::nc_close(nc_prof)
